content.raw:
should there be a check to see if it's installing the component's master header? Currently the component's master header is overwriting the main library's master header file:

e.g. in ign-rendering,  the `<install_path>/include/ignition/rendering0/ignition/rendering.hh` file corresponds to optix's `rendering.hh` as it's being installed last.
content.html:
should there be a check to see if it's installing the component's master header? Currently the component's master header is overwriting the main library's master header file:

e.g. in ign-rendering, the <install_path>/include/ignition/rendering0/ignition/rendering.hh file corresponds to optix's rendering.hh as it's being installed last.
